## Biography
Mattias is majoring in Psychology and minoring in Philosophy. He is graduating in Spring 2025 and plans to attend graduate school for social psychology. Mattias has many interests including interpersonal relationships, identity and personality. He is also interested in how technology can help improve our understanding of each other. 

## Semesters

- Spring 2025, *Research Assistant*
- Fall 2024, *Research Assistant*
